clishell

Class CliMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • clishell.CliMethod

  • public final class CliMethod
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CliMethodForm[] SUPPORTED_CLIMETHODFORMS
      SUPPORTED_CLIMETHODFORMS - array specifying the set of currently supported java method types, according to classification specified by CliMethodForm; method operations on this class for other types may not work (especially the invoke() method and its variants)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CliMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      constructs a CliMethod wrapping the specified java method will immediately inspect the java method in order to compute the method's CliMethodForm, which can then be requested by using getCliMethodForm()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CliMethodForm getCliMethodForm() 
      java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod() 
      java.lang.String getMethodSignature() 
      int getNumUserParameters() 
      java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object instance) 
      java.lang.Object invokeCliCommand(java.lang.Object instance, CliCommandOptions options, java.lang.String[] args, int nCommandArgs) 
      java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.Object[] args)
      Calls native "invoke" method of wrapped java method on the specified object instance and returns result.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SUPPORTED_CLIMETHODFORMS

        public static final CliMethodForm[] SUPPORTED_CLIMETHODFORMS
        SUPPORTED_CLIMETHODFORMS - array specifying the set of currently supported java method types, according to classification specified by CliMethodForm; method operations on this class for other types may not work (especially the invoke() method and its variants)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CliMethod

        public CliMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        constructs a CliMethod wrapping the specified java method will immediately inspect the java method in order to compute the method's CliMethodForm, which can then be requested by using getCliMethodForm()
        Parameters:
        method - java method to wrap in this CliMethod object

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        public java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
        Returns:
        the java method wrapped by this CliMethod

      • getCliMethodForm

        public CliMethodForm getCliMethodForm()
        Returns:
        the CliMethodForm classifier of the wrapped java method

      • getNumUserParameters

        public int getNumUserParameters()

        the numUserParameters

      • invokeCliCommand

        public java.lang.Object invokeCliCommand(java.lang.Object instance,
                                         CliCommandOptions options,
                                         java.lang.String[] args,
                                         int nCommandArgs)
                                  throws CliRunnerException
        Parameters:
        instance - object instance to invoke method on
        options - object containing command line options
        args - CLI arguments (args[0] is CLI command, args[1..n] are CLI command-line arguments as individual tokens); at least args[0] is required
        nCommandArgs - number of arguments at front of args comprising "command name" part of command (note that the command can be invoked by the user via different command names, so this value will not be known until execution time)
        Returns:
        object returned by invoked method
        Throws:
        CliRunnerException - unhandled exception
        See Also:
        invokeMethod(Object, Object[])

      • invoke

        public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object instance)
                        throws CliRunnerException
        Parameters:
        instance - object instance
        Returns:
        object returned by invoked method
        Throws:
        CliRunnerException - unhandled CLI Method exception
        See Also:
        invokeMethod(Object, Object[])

      • getMethodSignature

        public java.lang.String getMethodSignature()
        Returns:
        human-readable "method signature" describing method's argument(s) and return type

      • invokeMethod

        public java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object instance,
                                     java.lang.Object[] args)
                              throws CliRunnerException
        Calls native "invoke" method of wrapped java method on the specified object instance and returns result. Wraps call in a "try / catch" to standardize the exception handling so that only a CliRunnerException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        instance - object instance to invoke method on; may be null if static method is called
        args - arguments to pass to object; may be null if no arguments are being passed, and may be shorter than required number of arguments required by call (in which case null values will be supplied for all final method arguments which are not supplied).
        Returns:
        object returned by invoked method
        Throws:
        CliRunnerException - unhandled exception
        See Also:
        Method.invoke(Object, Object...)
